description: Bio Flash is an innovative initiative founded in 2017, aimed at addressing the challenges of organic waste management in Peru. By utilizing a unique microbial consortium, Bio Flash accelerates the composting process, transforming organic waste into nutrient-rich compost in just 30 to 35 days. The initiative not only supports sustainable agriculture but also empowers local farmers and businesses to manage their waste effectively, contributing to a circular economy and environmental sustainability.
name: Bio Flash
